name: The Amazing Spider-Man: Countdown to Doom
summary: Spider-Man sets out to stop the menace of Rhino, Sandman and Black Cat in New York. The main game can be played in the Adventure Play mode with the full story or the Quick Play mode which skips the story and goes straight to the mini-games. The mini-games can be played in three modes of difficulty with normal or unlimited chance and one or two players. Included with the main game is the Knowledge World which shows and quizzes scientific facts about Earth, Physics and Life. Lastly, there is the Creative Workshop, in which players can customize machines and take cool pictures.
